content: direct link to pattern pdf 1 pattern is entirely in japanese but charted this is a cover for pet water bottles **gauge** no gauge is listed in the pattern **materials** * japanese size 3/0 and 7/0 2 3 and 4 0 mm crochet hooks * lace hook size 6 1 0 mm * approx 10g 66 meters laceweight color a * approx 7g 46 2 meters laceweight color b * approx 7g 46 2 meters laceweight color c * scraps of laceweight color d * approx 14g 21 meters bulky color e * plastic pet water bottle **note ** this same pattern appears again on the pierrot website with a different name and pattern photo it is called 27-33 2 on the pattern website and ペットボトルホルダー *petto botoru horudā* in the pattern pdf the patterns are **identical** however 1 http //www gosyo co jp/img/acrobat/kyudo/524/petholder pdf 2 http //www rakuten co jp/gosyo/461397/713923/826132/830700/
